title: Caesar Cipher
text: I wrote this mini project in one day for the cryptography course at the university. I used native JS and the CSS framework Bootstrap for styles. For me, it was a positive experience because today cryptography is used everywhere.

title: Virtual Keyboard
text: This mini project is a virtual keyboard written on native JS and with the CSS styles. The project was one of my first attempts to use my knowledge of HTML, CSS and JS in creating something useful for other users.

title: Game Clicker
text: This is a simple and fun clicker game written in native JS and using CSS. I wrote it be following a tutorial from YouTube. It was fun to coding this mini game, I learned that JS can be fun
